nodes.text: During the early years of the New Republic, Imperial warlord Moff Kentor Sarne organized some of his forces into formations he called a roving fleet. One such fleet, consisting of a Lancer-class frigate, Strike-class medium cruiser, and an Ton-Falk-class escort carrier, engaged the New Republic CR90 corvette FarStar above Galtea in 8 ABY.
